content: Here are the elements to consider when crafting your perfect prompt! Get ready to ignite your creativity!
Subject defines what your image will be about and sets the stage for DALL-E to work its magic.

title: Creating a Simple Subject Image
instruction: Fill in the gap to practice generating an image with a specific subject.

content:
Style defines the artistic flair of your image. If you have a clear vision of the style, make sure to include it in your prompt.

DALL-E is not a fortune teller; it needs precise instructions to create what you envision precisely.

title: Creating an Image with a Specific Style
instruction: Fill in the gap to practice generating an image with a specific style.

content:
Composition defines how you frame your subject to make it stand out.

The right composition captures the essence of your subject perfectly.

title: Creating an Image with a Specific Composition
instruction: Fill in the gap to practice generating an image with a specific composition.

content:
Emotion defines the vibe your image should radiate.

Bringing emotions to life in your image can make it more engaging and relatable.

title: Capturing Emotion in an Image
instruction: Fill in the gap to practice generating an image with a specific emotion.

content:
What action should your subject be performing?

Incorporating action into your image can add dynamism and interest.

title: Incorporating Action in an Image
instruction: Fill in the gap to practice generating an image with a specific action.

content: Let's see how well you understand the importance of proper prompts!

question: Is the prompt "An elderly woman with hopeful eyes" good? Why or why not?

options.text: No, it's too vague and lacks details about style, composition, and specific emotions
Yes, because it includes an emotion, which is important for creating a vivid image

explanation: The correct answer focuses on the importance of providing detailed information in a prompt. A good prompt needs to include specifics about style, composition, and emotions to help the AI create a vivid image.

question: Is the prompt "A close-up of an elderly woman with a hopeful look in her eyes in the drip paint style" good? Why or why not?

options.text: Yes, it includes all key elements: subject, style, composition, and emotion

explanation: Yes, it includes all key elements: subject, style, composition, and emotion. A good prompt should provide clear and detailed information to help DALL-E generate a more vivid and accurate image.

question: Which of the following prompts includes all key elements for a perfect prompt?

options.text: A bustling city street during rush hour in a vintage photograph style

explanation: This prompt brilliantly captures the subject (city street), style (vintage photograph), composition (during rush hour), and emotion (bustling).

title: Crafting a Perfect Prompt
instruction: Fill in the gaps to create a detailed and effective prompt for DALL-E!

content:
This is the final task. Let's test your knowledge of prompt anatomy.

You realize that the prompt "A cat sitting on a windowsill" is not the best.

question: How would you fix the prompt 'A cat sitting on a windowsill' to make it more effective?

options.text: A close-up of a cat sitting on a windowsill with a serene expression in the watercolor style

explanation: A close-up of a cat sitting on a windowsill with a serene expression in the watercolor style captures all key elements: subject, style, composition, and emotion.

content: Congratulations! You've learned the essential elements of crafting effective prompts and practiced with DALL-E. Keep experimenting and refining your prompts to create stunning images. Good luck with your creative journey!
